author: cnbc.com
title: Kemper Announces Quarterly Dividend
text:
CHICAGO--(BUSINESS WIRE)-- Kemper Corporation (NYSE: KMPR) announced today that its Board of Directors declared a quarterly dividend of $0.24 per share. The dividend is payable on March 6, 2018 to its shareholders of record as of February 20, 2018.
About Kemper
The Kemper family of companies is one of the nationâ€™s leading insurers. With $8 billion in assets, Kemper is improving the world of insurance by offering personalized solutions for individuals, families and businesses. Kemper's businesses collectively:
Offer insurance for home, auto, life, health and valuables Service six million policies Are represented by 20,000 agents and brokers Employ 5,550 associates dedicated to providing exceptional service Are licensed to sell insurance in 50 states and the District of Columbia
Learn more about Kemper .
